official_title: To require reports on the results of and methods used to calculate any cost-benefit or regulatory impact analysis, and for other purposes.
short_title: Cost-Benefit and Regulatory Transparency Enhancement Act of 2013

titles.title: Cost-Benefit and Regulatory Transparency Enhancement Act of 2013
